This looks good to me! As there might be a merge conflict after #13058 is merged, I delegate it:

bors d+

:v: semorrison can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: the forgetful functor from `Mon_ C` to `C` is monoidal when `C` is braided
